plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm short and leafy.
🐇 Bunnies love to eat me!
🐄 Cows eat lots of me.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a pretty head. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People often give me as a gift.
🐝 Bees like to visit me.
🌷 I come in lots of colors.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and sometimes I'm red, sometimes green. You can eat me!

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one.
🥧 People bake pies with me.
☀️ An ______ a day keeps the doctor away

plant.question: I have a big trunk and lots of leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I am very tall.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me.

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
👀 I am good for your eyesight.
🚜 Farmers grow me in the ground.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy snack when heated. You eat me at the movies.

hints.text: 🍿 You hear a popping sound when I am made
🌽 I come from a yellow plant.
🎬 People like to eat me while watching films.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside, but I'm sweet and juicy inside. I grow in a desert.

hints.text: 🌵 I grow on a cactus.
🏜️ I help you stay hydrated.
☀️ I like hot and dry places.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows in water, and I have a yummy grain that people eat.

hints.text: 🍚 Many people eat me with chopsticks.
🌏 I am a very important food in Asia.
💦 I need lots of water to grow.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked.

hints.text: 🥦 I am good for you to eat!
🌳 I look like a miniature forest.
🧀 I am sometimes served with cheese.

plant.question: I am a long, thin plant that climbs up walls or trees. I have twisting stems.

hints.text: 🌿 Tarzan swings on me!
🐒 Monkeys like to swing on me
🧱 Sometimes I grow on buildings.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You can ride in me with your family.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
⛽ I need gas to go.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people for rides. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place.
🐳 Whales sometimes swim near me.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people at once. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal lines.
🚂 I have lots of carriages.
📣 I make a loud horn sound.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
💺 People sit in seats inside me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.
🧑‍⚕️ Wear a helmet when you use me

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🎒 Kids carry backpacks on me.
🏫 I drive to school every day.

transport.question: I help people when there is a fire and am always red and very loud. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I have a ladder on top.
🚨 I have a siren that goes 'wee-ooh!'
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.

transport.question: I fly but I don't have wings. I have a big blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚑 Sometimes I'm used to take people to the hospital.
👮 The police sometimes use me to fly around.

transport.question: I am like a car but I can carry lots of things. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver packages to your house.
🍎 I can carry food.
🛢️ I can be very big and carry fuel.

transport.question: I go very fast to space. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🚀 I have a countdown before I launch.
🛰️ I can put satellites into orbit.
